app_descript:
Brief

Microsoft Start, known by the app package name com.microsoft.amp.apps.bingnews, is a comprehensive news and entertainment platform designed to connect users with a vast range of content from around the globe. It provides a personalized experience, allowing you to stay informed on topics that interest you, manage your messages, and enjoy various online activitiesâ€”all within a singular application.
